original_text: And he had bronze armor on his legs, and a javelin of bronze slung between his shoulders.
korean_text: 그의 다리에는 놋 각반을 쳤고 어깨 사이에는 놋 단창을 메었으니

sentences.original_text: And he had bronze armor on his legs
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 다리에 놋 갑옷을 입고 있었다.

sentences.original_text: and a javelin of bronze slung between his shoulders.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어깨 사이에 놋 단창을 메고 있었다.
